p: The BAL fluid was centrifuged (320 g, 10 min, 4 °C) and the supernatant immediately frozen at − 80 °C. Total cell count of cells resuspended in 0.5 ml of PBS was performed automatically with a Casy® cell counter. Cytospots were stained by QuickDiff (Medion Diagnostic, Duedingen, Switzerland) to evaluate differential cell counts.
